game_description: Become a starfighter pilot and free the universe. Take part in epic battles. Fight the enemies in a vast galaxy with 45 star systems. High-quality visuals including models, textures and effects. The graphics are impressive and gameplay shows great potential.
review_1: Do not bother to buy, game is misleading, you cannot fly anywhere, you are stationary and shooting slow spaceships,big space battles, yeah right, big con more like it
review_2: Now that controls are proper, this is very fun! Keep it up!
